title: Fight or Flight
description: The Rocinante crew deals with the fallout over Naomiâ€™s betrayal while caught in the middle of the war between Earth and Mars. Avasarala and Bobbie hatch an escape plan

title: IFF
description: The Rocinante answers an unexpected distress signal; Bobbie and Avasarala find themselves being hunted by a mysterious captor; UN Secretary-General Sorrento-Gillis brings in a colleague from his past to lend an ear during this crucial time of war.

title: Assured Destruction
description: Earth strategizes a costly ploy to gain advantage in the war against Mars; Anna struggles to convince Sorrento-Gillis to do the right thing; Avasarala and Bobbie seek refuge aboard the Rocinante.

title: Reload
description: The Rocinante tends to wounded Martian soldiers in exchange for supplies; Avasarala struggles with how to disseminate a key piece of evidence despite being in hiding.[12]

title: Triple Point
description: The search for Prax's daughter comes to a head; Admiral Souther's men plan for mutiny aboard the Agatha King.[13]

title: Immolation
description: The final battle between Earth and Mars threatens the very future of humanity; a new monster is unleashed on Prospero Station; Anna receives the smoking gun she needs. [12]

title: Delta-V
description: All eyes turn to the edge of the Solar System as a mysterious new presence emerges; Naomi recommits to her roots; Drummer butts heads with a seasoned new commander aboard the Behemoth; and a young Belter makes a name for himself.

title: It Reaches Out
description: An old friend taunts Holden with the answers he seeks; Naomi struggles to fit in; a mysterious low-level tech aboard the Thomas Prince enacts a terrifying plan.[14]

title: Intransigence
description: The Rocinante seeks a new game plan as they attempt to avoid capture; Melba's true motives are revealed; Naomi is torn between identity and ideal; Anna seeks a way to stay aboard the Thomas Prince.

title: Dandelion Sky
description: Holden sees past, present, and future; a ghost from Melba's past threatens her mission; Bobbie struggles to trust an old friend as she leads a group into uncharted territory.

title: Fallen World
description: Drummer and Ashford find themselves trapped with few options for survival; Anna tends to the wounded masses as Melba continues to hunt down her prey; the Rocinante crew struggles to survive as Naomi reunites with her true family.

title: Congregation
description: As survivors arrive to the Behemoth, two factions form over how to handle a life-or-death threat; Holden grapples with what he's seen and the choices he must make.

title: Abaddon's Gate
description: Holden and his allies must stop Ashford and his team from destroying the Ring, and perhaps all of humanity.
